Articles.Content:
//BATTLE LOG//

///Mechani Union Battlecruiser Nicholas J. Fury attacks USSZS Butcher.///

The first half of the attack wears down the structure of the hull near the midsection and rear, firing 3 SRBs and 2 quad-volleys of i-beams...

The second half fired 2 more i-beam volleys and the last 3 SRBs loaded onboard to ensure that the Butcher's engines were obliterated.

The Butcher is now ruined, with no long-range propulsion, she's been left to drift around Eeloo...

Noticing that it was low on ammo, the crew of the MU Nick Fury managed to locate half an SRB stack from one of its wrecked siblings.

(I think it was the Strangekerb's.) (The ship also has one quad-salvo of i-beams remaining)

Following this, the Fury went into a stable parking orbit, as Beta-3 flew up to recover the last remaining i-beams left over from the wrecked MU ships. (THIS TOOK FOREVER...)

Do you wish to continue, Zekes? You only have one fully operational ship left... (it's the Thresher, I think) I have 3:

Beta-2

Beta-3

Nicholas J. Fury

Persist:

http://www./download/w769w1ac77grdrg/persistent.sfs

Edited April 11, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h
wanted to include the name of zekes' last ship?

//BATTLE LOG//

///Mechani Union Battlecruiser Nicholas J. Fury attacks USSZS Butcher.///

The first half of the attack wears down the structure of the hull near the midsection and rear, firing 3 SRBs and 2 quad-volleys of i-beams...

http://i.imgur.com/7EiRJA4.png

http://i.imgur.com/qLmM9Fe.png

The second half fired 2 more i-beam volleys and the last 3 SRBs loaded onboard to ensure that the Butcher's engines were obliterated.

http://i.imgur.com/6uUABUT.png

http://i.imgur.com/xF7sWaB.png

http://i.imgur.com/p60cOMM.png

The Butcher is now ruined, with no long-range propulsion, she's been left to drift around Eeloo...

http://i.imgur.com/p8YUhEa.png

Noticing that it was low on ammo, the crew of the MU Nick Fury managed to locate half an SRB stack from one of its wrecked siblings.

(I think it was the Strangekerb's.) (The ship also has one quad-salvo of i-beams remaining)

http://i.imgur.com/pWssT0l.png

Following this, the Fury went into a stable parking orbit, as Beta-3 flew up to recover the last remaining i-beams left over from the wrecked MU ships. (THIS TOOK FOREVER...)

http://i.imgur.com/nR02rX2.png

Do you wish to continue, Zekes? You only have one fully operational ship left... (it's the Thresher, I think) I have 3:

Beta-2

Beta-3

Nicholas J. Fury

Persist:

http://www./download/w769w1ac77grdrg/persistent.sfs

We will fight to the end, because we have two ships in fact. Phineas is still active, and is waiting..... this could be interesting...

We will fight to the end, because we have two ships in fact. Phineas is still active, and is waiting..... this could be interesting...

Ahh, you are 100% correct, sir! However, is Phineas able to actually go anywhere?
Also, I just invented a new breed of .5 meter ammo. It uses an I-beam, but is guided somewhat... and can be remote-detonated.

Well, here she is! Speak of the devil, Phineas not only was able to reach Fury but I was careful and was able to completely destroy her with two SRBs. Then, I rendezvoused with Butcher and took 4 SRBs and fuel from her shattered hulk, then went up into high Eeloo orbit.

So, that means you have two Corvettes against a Light Cruiser and Destroyer. Would you like to call a draw? You are low on ammo and I don't think you can kill both ships with little girder missiles.

Persist:

https://www./?cws8x0awxvj3smc

Gallery:

Fury is our target.

First SRB destroyed her engines, but I wasn't satisfied.

That's better!

Rearming and refueling at the Butcher

All ready to go.

Well, here she is! Speak of the devil, Phineas not only was able to reach Fury but I was careful and was able to completely destroy her with two SRBs. Then, I rendezvoused with Butcher and took 4 SRBs and fuel from her shattered hulk, then went up into high Eeloo orbit.

So, that means you have two Corvettes against a Light Cruiser and Destroyer. Would you like to call a draw? You are low on ammo and I don't think you can kill both ships with little girder missiles.

http://i.imgur.com/oiooUg5.jpg

I'll have to evaluate the situation and then decide my course of action. Nice flying there, dude. I think I'm starting to hunt for weak spots in your ships, because I know that despite their small size and relative speed compared to SRBs, I-beams are still very effective when used correctly. That being said, my project AP-X (next gen I-beam AP ammo, guided) will be a significant upgrade to my current ones.
